pages.text: The Statue of Broken Curses can remove directed curses, like $(l:circle_magic/curses/misfortune)Misfortune$(/l), $(l:circle_magic/curses/insanity)Insanity$(/l), $(l:circle_magic/curses/sinking)Sinking(/l) and others. If a player murders another within the area of effect of the statue, they will no longer receive its protection.
